scripts.build: tailwindcss -i ./src/styles.css -o ./dist/styles.css --minify && cp ./index.html ./dist/ && sed -i "s|<link href='./dist/styles.css'|<link href='./styles.css'|g" ./dist/index.html && cp ./src/index.js ./dist/ && sed -i "s|./src/index.js|./index.js|g" ./dist/index.html && cp -r ./src/images ./dist/ && sed -i "s|./src/images/|./images/|g" ./dist/index.html && sed -i "s|/src/images/|/images/|g" ./dist/index.html
